product_name: BOB Single Infant Car Seat Adapter - Fits Britax Seats
long_description: Adapt your BOB Stroller into an infant stroller system. The BOB Infant Car Seat Adapter allows for easy installation of compatible Britax and BOB infant car seats.
short_description: Adapt your BOB Stroller into an infant stroller system. The BOB Infant Car Seat Adapter allows for easy installation of compatible Britax and BOB infant car seats.
